humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the pathology report, the patient has 'Axillary lymph nodes: Negative (0/4 sentinel lymph nodes)'. This indicates that no metastatic carcinoma was found in the sentinel lymph nodes. Based on the new rules 10 and 11, N0 can indicate no metastatic carcinoma in sentinel lymph nodes and regional lymph nodes or that all assessed lymph nodes are negative for metastatic carcinoma. Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N0.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that 0/4 sentinel lymph nodes were positive for cancer metastasis. This corresponds to N0 in the pTNM staging system, which indicates no regional lymph node involvement.
